settings.title: Contact Support
settings.description_col_1:
Customer Care

Questions or problems with an order or existing RMA? Please get in touch through the chat during business hours for an immediate response.
settings.description_col_2:
Technical Care

Need assistance with a HyperX Product you own? Chat with one of our experts to troubleshoot your issues or open an RMA.

settings.heading: Title with Description
settings.footnote:
Important Christmas announcement!

Due to the end-of-year holidays the chat to contact our Care team will be closed from December 24th to December 26th included, on December 31st and January 1st.


For a delivery before Christmas, the last day to order on our website is December 20th.


Our Care teams will have limited availability from Tuesday, December 24, 2024 to January 1st, 2025, expect delays until January 6th. Please double and triple check your shipping info!
We wish you and all the HyperX Family a Happy Holiday full of gaming!
